entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: Hepzibah is the mistress of the house and a lady who is being visited by Voldemort. She is described as an old lady who spoils her house-elf, Hokey.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who has made a request to Hepzibah and is visiting her at her home. He is described as looking pale and being overworked.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: Hokey is the house-elf of Hepzibah's household. She is described as coming into the room carrying a tray of little cakes.

relationships.description: Voldemort visits Hepzibah at her home, where he makes an offer for the goblin-made armour.
Voldemort interacts with Hokey, who brings him a tray of little cakes.
